ability.name: World Ender

ability.desc:
Steal essence from enemies around the current target, dealing @ModifiedEssenceDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @TooltipReave@% Mana Reaving them.

Every @ActualBoomTooltip@ casts, unleash a wave that deals @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies hit. This deals @EssenceStolenMultiplier*100@% more damage to enemies whose essence has been stolen.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@ Mana per second

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast
ability.name: Essence Thief

ability.desc:
Lock on to the farthest enemy and unleash a hail of @NumBullets@ shots toward them. Each deals
@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the first enemy hit.
ability.name: Comeuppance

ability.desc:
Fire @Shots@ arrows in a cone, each dealing @ArrowDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for @ModifiedDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by @Chill@%
ability.name: Volley

ability.desc:
Passive: Every third attack, a Sand Soldier deals @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. If Azir already has @MaxSummons@ Soldiers, they all immediately deal @MaxSoldierStrike@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.
ability.name: Arise!

ability.desc: Lash out at the lowest Health enemy in range <TFTBonus>@ModifiedNumStrikes@ (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> times. Each lash deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and <trueDamage>@PercentHealthTrueDamage*100@%</trueDamage> of the target's max Health as true damage.
ability.name: Royal Maelstrom

ability.desc:
Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the lowest Health enemy in range. If this kills them, devour them and permanently gain @BonusHealthOnKill@ maximum Health (doubled in Hyper Roll).

(Current Bonus: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT9_ChoGathBonusHealth@ Health)
ability.name: Feast

ability.desc: Deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target. If they die, immediately cast this again with <scaleLevel>@PercentDamageFalloff*100@%</scaleLevel> damage.
ability.name: Noxian Guillotine

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@HealPercent*100@%</scaleHealth> of damage taken in the last @RewindTime@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.
ability.name: Phase Dive

ability.desc: Spin <TFTBonus>@SpinsTooltip@ (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> times every second for the next <TFTBonus>@ModifiedDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> seconds. Each spin deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Judgement

ability.desc:
Dash around the current target and snip @Snips@ times in a cone, each dealing @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit.

Every @CastCountForMist@ casts, gain @MistResists@ Armor and Magic Resist for @MistDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Snip Snip!

ability.desc: Hurl a grenade towards the largest group of enemies, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a large area and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: CH-3X Lightning Grenade

ability.desc: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Cataclysm

ability.desc: Grant <TFTBonus>@ModifiedEnhancedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed to Jayce and <TFTBonus>@ModifiedPercentAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> to the allies on his left and right for @Duration@ seconds. Fire a blast at the current target that explodes on the first enemy hit. It deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies near the blast.
ability.name: Acceleration Blast

ability.desc: Fire @NumberOfRockets@ rockets at random enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes of the current target. Each rocket deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Fishbones!

ability.desc: Dash away from all enemies, then fire <scaleLevel>@NumMissiles@</scaleLevel> missiles split across the @NumTargets@ nearest enemies. Each missile deals <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Icathian Rain

ability.desc:
Fire a burst of energy that explodes upon impact, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every third cast launches @EmpoweredBursts@ bursts.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@ Ability Power
ability.name: Inner Flame

ability.desc:
Throw three daggers that land next to enemies within @SpellRange@ (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Then, teleport to each and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and Wound them for @WoundDuration@ seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by @WoundPercent*100@%
ability.name: Voracity

ability.desc:
Passive: Start combat with @Shield@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield. When it expires, dismount and gain @ModifiedAttackSpeedPercent@ (%i:scaleAP%) stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Active: Remount and gain @Shield@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield.

4-Star Upgrade: Execute enemies under @ExecuteThreshold@% Health.
ability.name: Skaaaaaaarl!

ability.desc:
Heal for @HealAmount@ (%i:scaleHealth%), then knock up the current target before smashing them to the edge of the battlefield. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Deal @CollisionDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies the target collides with and Stun them for @SecondaryStunDuration@ seconds.

If the target can't be pushed back any further, knock them off the battlefield. Otherwise, chase after them.
ability.name: All Out Strike

ability.desc: Stun the current target for @StunDuration@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes of them. They take @DamageAmp*100@% more damage for the next @DebuffDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Frozen Tomb

ability.desc: Channel a barrage of light at the current target that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over <scaleLevel>@Duration@</scaleLevel> seconds, reducing their Magic Resist by <scaleLevel>@Shred@</scaleLevel> every second. If they die, shift to a new target.
ability.name: Torrent of Light

ability.desc: Grant the lowest Health ally <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShielding@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and empowers Orianna's next attack to deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Command: Protect

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.
ability.name: Steadfast Hammer

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedSelfShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield and grant @ModifiedAllyShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield to the 2 lowest-Health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. After shielding his allies, Shen's Shield refreshes with a burst, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@% Damage Reduction
ability.name: Ki Barrier

ability.desc:
Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target and mark them. If they are below @HealthThreshold*100@% max Health, deal true damage instead. If the target is marked, deal @MarkDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus true damage.

If this kills the target, rip through them 1 hex and heal for @HealAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%).
ability.name: Furious Bite

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedInitialHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> for the first enemy hit and another <scaleHealth>@ModifiedKickerHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> for each additional one.
ability.name: Cull the Meek

ability.desc:
Passive: Whenever an ally attacks a Chilled enemy, they deal @HealthDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%) bonus true damage.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies and Chill them for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
ability.name: Fury of the North

ability.desc: Fire a massive beam at the furthest enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to all enemies hit. Any allies hit gain <TFTBonus>@TotalShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Dawning Shadow

ability.desc:
Passive: Upon death, reanimate with @ReviveHealthPct*100@% Health, decaying at @DecayHealthPct*100@% maximum Health per second. Sion can no longer use his Ability, but is immune to crowd control and gains
@ModifiedAttackSpeedPct@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed.

Active: Charge towards the most enemies within @DashRangeTooltip@ (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to any enemies along the way and knock them up, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Glory in Death

ability.desc: Send a wave of sound at the largest clump of enemies and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit; each hit reduces this damage by @FalloffPercent*100@%. Allies hit by the wave gain <TFTBonus>@AttackSpeed@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Crescendo

ability.desc:
Heal the lowest health ally for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%). If the ally is below @EmpoweredHealThreshold*100@% Health, heal them for an additional @TooltipBonusHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%).

Over the next @Duration@ seconds, @NumberOfStars@ stars hit the enemy closest to them. Each deals @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
ability.name: Astral Infusion

ability.desc:
Transform and gain @ModifiedBonusHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) max Health. While transformed, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

If already transformed, gain an additional @ModifiedSecondaryBonusHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) max Health and deal @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within.
ability.name: Demonflare

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. It redirects @RedirectPercent*100@% of the damage received by adjacent allies.
ability.name: Radiance

ability.desc:
Hurl an explosive heat-seeking mushroom at the current target. When it detonates, enemies within 1 hex are Wounded and dealt @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over @Duration@ seconds.

4-Star Upgrade: Increase the explosion radius by 1 hex.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
ability.name: Noxious Trap

ability.desc: Fire a plasma bolt towards the current target that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the first enemy hit. It then splits in two, dealing @FalloffPercent*100@% less damage whenever it passes through an enemy.
ability.name: Plasma Fission

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks heal for @ModifiedHealAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Gain @BonusAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds. Then, Stun adjacent enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Primal Howl

ability.desc:
Send a whirlwind at the furthest enemy within @SpellRangeTooltip@ hexes, knocking up and Stunning all enemies hit. Dash to and slash the original target, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to them. Slam them into the ground and deal @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@% Omnivamp

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt
ability.name: Last Breath

ability.desc:
Create a shadow at the furthest enemy within @SpellRangeTooltip@ (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Zed and his shadow slash adjacent enemies, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@% Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage
ability.name: Living Shadow

ability.desc:
Passive: Cast every @CastCadence@ attacks and cycle between 3 different Abilities: this, Voracious Bite (damage an enemy and heal), and Void Tentacle (damage and Stun a group).

Active: Lob three pools of acid towards the largest group of enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @TooltipShred@% Shredding and Sundering for @DebuffDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Corrosive Acid

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedBaseDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and Wound them for @WoundDuration@ seconds. If they are already Wounded, deal @BonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
ability.name: Twin Fang

ability.desc: Charge toward the furthest enemy and crash into the first enemy hit. Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies adjacent to the impact and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Void Charge

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Void Shield

ability.desc: Fire a laser beam at the current target. Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies it passes through.
ability.name: H-28G Laser Beam

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex of the current target and @ArmorShredPercent*100@% Sunder them for @ArmorShredDuration@ seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Blast Shield

ability.desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy uses their Ability, gain @BonusManaOnCast@ Mana.

Active: On next attack, heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%).
ability.name: Sap Magic

ability.desc:
Passive: Gains new Passive effects as your Tactician levels up.
Level 1: Attacks deal @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.
Level @FirstAscensionLevel@: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals @AscensionModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @ShredAmount@% Shreds enemies for @ShredDuration@ seconds.
Level @SecondAscensionLevel@: Every attack launches a wave and they travel farther.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
ability.name: Divine Ascent

ability.desc: Shoot at the current target and deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. Reduce their Armor by <TFTBonus>@ModifiedArmorShred@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Flair

ability.desc:
T-Hex is still powering up and has no Ability. Once she reaches @PowerRequirement@ Power, gain Hextech Breath.

Hextech Breath: Unleash a huge laser dealing magic damage.
ability.name: Powering Up

ability.desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy enters Attack Range, fire a blast from the leg facing that direction that deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage. Each of Urgot's 6 legs has a @Cooldown@ second cooldown.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and dash behind the current target. Reset all leg cooldowns.
ability.name: Disdain

ability.desc:
Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals @TotalBlastDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within @BlastSize@ hexes.

For @ChakramDuration@ seconds, equip @BaseChakramNumber@ Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast. Attacks deal @TotalChakramDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage for each Chakram equipped. Aphelios heals for @ModifiedChakramHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%) of damage dealt by Chakrams.
ability.name: Moonlight Vigil

ability.desc:
Passive: Execute enemies below @ModifiedExecuteThreshold@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health.

Active: For the next @OverchargeDuration@ seconds, attacks chain lightning to @EnemyCount@ additional enemies, dealing @TotalChainDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
ability.name: Surge

ability.desc: Reduce damage taken by @DamageResist*100@% and heal for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over @Duration@ seconds. After, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Shield of Durand

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks impale a spear in the target, which deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) true damage when removed. Kalista rips the spears out if it would kill the target.

Active: Impale @NumSpears@ spears in the current target.
ability.name: Pierce and Rend

ability.desc:
Steal @PercentHealthSteal*100@% maximum Health, @PercentADSteal*100@% Attack Damage, @FlatResistanceSteal@ Armor, and @FlatResistanceSteal@ Magic Resist from the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies for @ModifiedDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

While empowered, every third attack deals @EmpoweredDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
ability.name: Soul Eater

ability.desc: Open two portals near the current target. Destroy @PercentShieldDestruction*100@% of Shields and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies caught between the portals.
ability.name: Call of the Void

ability.desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy is knocked up or back by anything, throw a boulder towards them. It deals @ModifiedBoulderDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal @ModifiedSpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and knock them up, Stunning them for @KnockupDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Seismic Shove

ability.desc:
Create a portal to Bandle City under the most expensive unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with @ModifiedBonusMana@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?

If there are no units left on your bench, Ryze summons a random high tier unit instead.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Bandle City

ability.desc:
Grab an enemy from either side and slam them together, knocking them up. Deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stuns them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by @SoloBonus*100@%.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@ max Health
ability.name: Facebreaker

ability.desc:
Take aim at the current target and deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies in a line; each hit reduces this damage by @FalloffPercent*100@%.

Ionia Bonus: +@TooltipIoniaBonus@% Attack Damage
ability.name: Curtain Call

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedStabDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target. For the rest of combat, Viego's attacks deal @ModifiedStackingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus stacking magic damage.

(Current Bonus: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT9_ViegoBonusDamage@ magic damage)
ability.name: Blade of the Ruined King

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a cone and Disarm them for @DisarmDuration@ seconds.

Disarm: Cannot move or attack, but CAN cast spells
ability.name: Force Pulse

ability.desc:
Create a portal to Demacia that protects allies for @PortalDuration@ seconds. Allies within the zone gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%).

When the portal expires, enemies within are dealt @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Demacia

ability.desc:
Create a portal to Bandle City under the most expensive unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with @ModifiedBonusMana@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?

If there are no units left on your bench, Ryze summons a random high tier unit instead.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Bandle City

ability.desc:
Create a portal to the Freljord under a random group of enemies for @PortalDuration@ seconds. The freezing winds deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Chill.

If enemies are already affected by Permafrost, they are instead Stunned for the duration.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by @AttackSpeedSlow*100@%
ability.name: Realm Warp: Freljord

ability.desc: Create a portal to Ionia in the center of the battlefield, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the <scaleLevel>@NumUnits@</scaleLevel> closest units. Allies gain <TFTBonus>@BonusAttackSpeed*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for @BuffDuration@ seconds and are healed for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over the duration. Enemies dance, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and Stunning them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Ionia

ability.desc:
Create a portal to Noxus that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor, granting @NumItems@ completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing @NumAxes@ axes towards random enemies that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each.

If an ally would recieve an item while all slots are full, they instead gain a stacking @DamageAmp*100@% damage increase for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Noxus

ability.desc: Create a portal to Piltover that launches an enforcer grenade towards the largest clump of enemies, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area for <scaleLevel>@AreaDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and <scaleLevel>@PercentSharedDamage*100@%</scaleLevel> of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Piltover

ability.desc:
Mark the @NumAllies@ ally's soul(s) with the lowest current health to be reclaimed by the Shadow Isles. After they die, they return to the battlefield with @ModifiedHealthOnReturn@ (%i:scaleAP%) of their maximum Health.

If all living allies are already marked, Ryze instead resurrects a deceased ally.

Ryze cannot resurrect himself.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Shadow Isles

ability.desc:
Create a portal to Shurima, summoning a roaming sand tornado that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them up, Stunning them for @KnockupDuration@ second(s).

The tornado has a chance to unearth buried treasures and gold as it travels.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Shurima

ability.desc:
Create a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons the current target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest group of enemies, dealing @ModifiedPercentMaxHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) of the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage. Enemies in the epicenter are briefly knocked up.

If the target is the only enemy remaining, they never descend.
ability.name: Realm Warp: Targon

ability.desc:
Create @NumPortals@ portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Wounds, @TooltipShredPercent@% Shreds, and @TooltipShredPercent@% Sunders for @DebuffDuration@ seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.

@Breakpoint1Gold@ Gold: +@Breakpoint1BonusPortals@ portal. Portals fire a rocket that deals @SplashDamagePercent*100@% damage in a one-hex radius.
@Breakpoint2Gold@ Gold: Double the portals. Summon @Breakpoint2BonusPortalsPerGold@ additional portals for every @GoldPerPortal@ Gold more.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 50%
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Realm Warp: Zaun

ability.desc:
Passive: Cast every @CastCadence@ attacks and cycle between 3 different Abilities: this, Voracious Bite (damage an enemy and heal), and Void Tentacle (damage and Stun a group).

Active: Lob three pools of acid towards the largest group of enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @TooltipShred@% Shredding and Sundering for @DebuffDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Corrosive Acid

ability.desc: Charge toward the furthest enemy and crash into the first enemy hit. Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies adjacent to the impact and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Void Charge

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Void Shield

traits.desc:
Bastion champions gain Armor and Magic Resist. This is increased by @BonusPercent*100@% for the first @Duration@ seconds of combat.

(@MinUnits@) +@BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%, +@BonusArmor@ %i:scaleMR%
traits.name: Bastion

traits.desc:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.

When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth% to @TargetNum@ enemies
(@MinUnits@) @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth% to @TargetNum@ enemies
traits.name: Sorcerer

traits.desc:
Your units gain @BonusAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed per star level.

If you have three 3-star champions, your Yordles can become 4-star, which gives their Ability a wacky upgrade!

(@MinUnits@) Your strongest 3-star Yordle
(@MinUnits@) Two 3-star Yordles

Ties for most items are broken by the Yordle fielded most recently.
traits.name: Yordle

traits.desc:
Innate: +@BonusRange@ Range

Every @ShotFrequency@ seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

(@MinUnits@) +@DamageAmp*100@% damage
traits.name: Deadeye

traits.desc:
Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies.

Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by @PercentHealthAPPerStarLevel*100@%.

(@MinUnits@) Void Remora
(@MinUnits@) Rift Herald
(@MinUnits@) Baron Nashor
traits.name: Void

traits.desc:
Your strongest Demacians become Elite and equip a Radiant item each combat. Elites grant Armor and Magic Resist to themselves and adjacent allies, but this does not stack.

(@MinUnits@) @NumElites@ Elite, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleArmor%, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @NumElites@ Elites, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleArmor%, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @NumElites@ Elites, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleArmor%, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @NumElites@ Elites, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleArmor%, +@BonusDefenses@ %i:scaleMR%

Radiant items are stronger versions of full items.
traits.name: Demacia

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) When a Rogue falls below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they briefly become untargetable and dash to an enemy within @HexRange@ hexes (preferring enemy backline).
(@MinUnits@) And a Rogue's damage bleeds their target for @BleedPct*100@% bonus magic damage over @BleedDuration@ seconds.
traits.name: Rogue

traits.desc:
Slayers gain @Omnivamp@% Omnivamp.

Slayers deal bonus damage, doubled against units below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health.

(@MinUnits@) +@BonusDamageBase@% bonus damage
traits.name: Slayer

traits.desc:
Every @TickRate@ seconds, your units gain Mana.

(@MinUnits@) @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to all
(@MinUnits@) Additional @SelfBonusMana@ to Invokers
(@MinUnits@) @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to all, additional @SelfBonusMana@ to Invokers
(@MinUnits@) @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to all, and start with an additional @TeamAP@ Ability Power
traits.name: Invoker

traits.desc:
Your units gain @TeamFlatHealth@ Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

(@MinUnits@) +@BonusPercentHealth*100@% max %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Bruiser

traits.desc:
Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by @BonusRatio*100@% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

(@MinUnits@) @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@ %i:scaleAP%, @AD@% %i:scaleAD%

Conquered bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT9_Trait_ConquerorBonus@% / @BonusRatio*700@%
traits.name: Noxus

traits.desc:
Every @PulsePeriod@ seconds, Shurimans heal @HealthRegen*100@% maximum Health. After @SecondsToAscend@ seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain @BonusHealthPercent*100@% maximum Health and @BonusASPercent*100@% Attack Speed.

(@MinUnits@) The strongest Shuriman Ascends
(@MinUnits@) All Shurimans Ascend. +@AscensionStrengthBoost*100@% Ascension bonus
(@MinUnits@) Instead, Ascend at combat start. +@AscensionStrengthBoost*100@% Ascension bonus
(@MinUnits@) Ascend twice, at combat start and after @SecondsToAscend@ seconds. +@AscensionStrengthBoost*100@% Ascension bonus
traits.name: Shurima

traits.desc:
Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldHP@ Shield; @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%
traits.name: Strategist

traits.desc: Whenever an ally gains a Shield, Senna grants them @AttackSpeed*100@% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
traits.name: Redeemer

traits.desc:
Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex and grants you loot based on the number of Charges converted.

(@MinUnits@) Gain the T-Hex.
(@MinUnits@) Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.
traits.name: Piltover

traits.desc:
Multicasters cast their Ability 1 additional time. Bonus casts have reduced effectiveness.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageReduction*100@% reduction
(@MinUnits@) @DamageReduction*100@% reduction
(@MinUnits@) @DamageReduction*100@% reduction. Attacks grant @ManaPerAuto@ bonus Mana.
traits.name: Multicaster

traits.desc:
When Gunner champions attack, they gain bonus Attack Damage, up to @MaxStacks@ stacks.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentAD@% %i:scaleAD% per stack
traits.name: Gunner

traits.desc:
When Bel'Veth kills an enemy, they leave behind Void Coral that she will consume. The first Coral increases her maximum Health by @PercentBonusMaxHealth*100@%, while further Coral heals her @PercentHealthHeal*100@% maximum Health.

When a Void Coral is consumed, she deals @PercentHealthMagicDamage*100@% maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within @HexRange@ hexes.
traits.name: Empress

traits.desc:
After dealing or receiving damage @DamageInstances@ times, Shadow Isles champions gain a Shield for @Duration@ seconds and become Spectral for the rest of combat. Spectral champions gain Mana every second.

(@MinUnits@) @MaxHealthShield@% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, @ManaRegen@ %i:scaleMana%
traits.name: Shadow Isles

traits.desc:
After @DelayTime@ seconds, an ice storm strikes the battlefield. Enemies take a percentage of their max Health as true damage and gain debuffs.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentHealthDamage@% %i:scaleHealth%, enemies are @ShredSunder@% Sundered and Shredded for @Duration@ seconds
(@MinUnits@) @PercentHealthDamage@% %i:scaleHealth%, enemies are also Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds

Sunder: Reduce Armor
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
traits.name: Freljord

traits.desc:
All of your units' healing and shielding is improved.

(@MinUnits@) @HealShieldIncrease*100@% increased healing and shielding
traits.name: Targon

traits.desc:
When Aatrox or the holder of the Darkin Blade dies, the Darkin Blade is equipped to the nearest allied champion, granting them @BonusHealth@ Health and @BonusOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp.

After being equipped to a champion for @RespawnTimer@ seconds, Aatrox will revive upon their death instead.
traits.name: Darkin

traits.desc: Ryze's ability changes depending on the Region Portal players voted for at the start of the game.
traits.name: Wanderer

traits.desc:
Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can be removed by benching or selling the champion.

(@MinUnits@) Gain 1 chem-mod
(@MinUnits@) Gain 2 chem-mods and Overcharge them
(@MinUnits@) Gain 5 chem-mods and Overcharge them
traits.name: Zaun

traits.desc:
Damage from Vanquisher Abilities can critically strike. Vanquishers gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseCritChance@% %i:scaleCrit% , @CritDmg@% %i:scaleCritMult%
traits.name: Vanquisher

traits.desc:
Juggernaut champions take less damage as their Health decreases.

(@MinUnits@) @MinDR*100@% to @MaxDR*100@% damage reduction
traits.name: Juggernaut

traits.desc:
Gain a placeable Apex Turret with 3 upgrade slots. Upgrades to the Apex Turret will show up in your shop for @GoldCost@ gold. The Apex Turret shares Heimerdinger's Attack Speed and Ability Power.

You may only have 1 Apex Turret.
traits.name: Technogenius

traits.desc:
Challengers gain bonus Attack Speed. When their target dies, Challengers dash to a new target and increase their Attack Speed bonus by @IncreasePct*100@% for @BurstDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusAS@% %i:scaleAS%
traits.name: Challenger

traits.desc:
Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability.

Every @SpiritDuration@ seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining @Mana@ mana and doubling stat bonuses for @SpiritDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @TooltipBonus*100@% Ionian bonus, @NumberOfSpirits@ enlightened
traits.name: Ionia

ability.desc: The Voidspawn gains bonus Health and Attack Damage based on the current Stage.
ability.name: Voidborn

ability.desc: The Training Dummy cannot move or attack. It is also dressed like a devilishly handsome Yordle.
ability.name: On Duty!

ability.desc: Drag this Tome to the Shop to open an Armory full of emblems! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Tome of Traits

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of completed items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Completed Item Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of component items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Component Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Artifact items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Artifact Item Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Support items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Support item anvil

ability.desc: This chest stores all of the accumulated loot you've collected. Win a combat against a player to open it!
ability.name: Mercenary Chest

ability.desc:
Play a @NumNotes@-note tune at random using 3 possible notes:

Doot - Deal @ModifiedSingleTarDmg@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target.
Chime - Heal the lowest Health ally for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health.
Tip - Drop @TipGold@ gold and play another note. (@TipGold_HR@ Gold in Hyper Roll)

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Improv

ability.desc:
Passive: Deal @ZapDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to a nearby enemy every @Period@ seconds.

Active: Gain a @ShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield. For @Duration@ seconds, Blitzcrank's Passive deals damage every second and deals an additional @HealthRatio*100@% of the target's max Health as magic damage.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Boogie Barrier

ability.desc:
Fire shots at the @NumShots@ furthest enemies. Shots deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the first enemy they hit.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Champ Hunt

ability.desc:
Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target and adjacent enemies, then Wound them for @ModifiedWoundDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Blown to 8 Bits

ability.desc:
Deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for @STUN_DURATION@ seconds. Gain a @SHIELD_TOTAL@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health shield for @SHIELD_DURATION@ seconds.

Bling Bonus: While the shield is up, heal @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_EkkoHealPerSecond@@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_EkkoHealPerSecond@ every second.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Record Scratch

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target. Gain @AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed that decays over @Duration@ seconds. While active, attacks restore @Healing@ Health.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Whiplash

ability.desc:
Blink away from the current target and deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to them. Every 3rd cast, deal @ModifiedBigDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to all enemies in a line.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Crash the Party

ability.desc:
Leap over the current target and transform into Mega Gnar for the rest of combat, gaining @ModifiedHealthGain@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health and @ADgain*100@% Attack Damage. Subsequent casts deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Rabid Fandom

ability.desc:
Heal @HEALING@ Health over @DURATION@ seconds. Then, deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and Chill them for @CCDuration@ seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Boogie Hour

ability.desc:
Passive: Every @Frequency@ seconds, Illaoi's tentacles deal @ModifiedTentacleDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) magic damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Gain @StatBonus@ Armor and Magic Resist for 3.5 seconds. Revive or fully heal the lowest Health tentacle. Leap at the nearest enemy and deal @TooltipDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a large circle @DrumNum@ times as tentacles slam in unison.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Drums of the Deep

ability.desc:
Leap at the highest Health enemy within @ModifiedHexRadius@ (%i:scaleRange%) hexes and deal @ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them. Then, deal @ModifiedSpinDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all adjacent enemies. Gain @StatBonus@% Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Counter Melody

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks generate @BonusManaOnAttack@ additional Mana. If your bench has @RiflesRequired@ Grand Finale Rifles, begin conducting instead of attacking. Each Rifle fires at the same rate as the Maestro and deals @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Every 4th volley deals @EmpoweredShotBonusTooltipOnly*100@% damage.

Active: Put @RIFLES_PER_CAST@ Grand Finale Rifle into one of your empty bench slots.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Concerto of Demise in D Minor

ability.desc:
Passive Minigun: Attacks grant @TOTAL_ATTACK_SPEED@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed.
Passive Rocket Launcher: Attacks deal @ROCKET_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage.

Active: Swap between Minigun and Rocket Launcher.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Escalation

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the @NumTargets@ lowest Health enemies. Gain @ManaGain@ Mana for each that dies.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Mortal Reminder

ability.desc:
Throw a blade at the current target that bounces @ExtraBounces@ times, dealing @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and applying Wound for @WoundDuration@ seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by @WoundPercent*100@%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Bouncing Blade

ability.desc:
For @Duration@ seconds, attacks deal @ModifiedAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage in waves at the current target and behind them. Shred enemies hit for @ShredDuration@ seconds. Finally, deal @ModifiedFinaleDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies around the target.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist by @Shred@%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Fires of Ascension

ability.desc:
Dash, then deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and Chill them for @ChillDuration@ seconds. If Kayn only hits one target, he immediately casts again.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Fear the Reaper

ability.desc:
Discharge @NumJolts@ Jolts over @SpellDuration@ seconds. Each Jolt deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to a random enemy within range and Stuns them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Bling Bonus: Discharge at 2nd target for @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_KennenPercentage@%@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_KennenPercentage@% damage and Stun duration.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Shock and Awe

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal Lillia for @ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%) and her nearest ally for @ModifiedAllyHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%).

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Confetti Bloom

ability.desc:
Fire @TotalNumShots@ (%i:scaleAS%) shots toward the furthest enemy. Each shot explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to all nearby enemies and reducing their Armor by @FlatArmorReduction@ for the rest of combat.

If Arpeggio ends early, gain Mana based on the number of unused shots.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Arpeggio

ability.desc:
Fire a bolt toward the current target. It deals @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the first enemy it passes through and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the second. Every 3rd cast, Stun the @NumOfEnemiesToStun@ nearest enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedBigCastDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Tastes like Glitter

ability.desc:
Fire a beam at the farthest enemy, dealing @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies it hits.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Laser Light Show

ability.desc:
Gain a @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield and deal @ModifiedZoneDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies over @Duration@ seconds. Afterwards, deal @ModifiedFinaleDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies.

When Face-Melter kills an enemy, gain @StatGain@% Ability Power and Attack Damage, and @StatGain@ Armor and Magic Resist.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Face-Melter

ability.desc:
Deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and Stun them for @PRISON_DURATION@ seconds.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Disco Prison

ability.desc:
Cosplay the highest Health ally and gain a @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield + @ShieldPercent@% of the ally's Health for @Duration@ seconds. When it breaks, deal @DamagePercent*100@% of its initial value as magic damage to adjacent enemies.

@TFTUnitProperty.unit:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Cosplay

ability.desc:
Reduce damage taken by @DR_TOTAL@ (%i:scaleAP%) for @DURATION@ seconds. Afterwards, deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the @NumTargets@ enemies who dealt the most damage to Pantheon during the duration.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Too Tough To Kill

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain Attack Damage based on bonus Health. (Current: @TotalBonusAD@% (%i:scaleHealth%))

Active: Gain @ArmorAndMR@ Armor and Magic Resistance for @Duration@ seconds. Hammer the nearest enemy @TargetNumber@ times; each deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and heals @TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Health. If this kills an enemy, slam an additional time.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Hammer Time

ability.desc:
Copy @NUM_ITEMS@ of the current target's items and throw them to an ally. Deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and knock them back. If the target had no items, deal @TD_TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%) additional true damage and knock them back to the edge of the board instead.

Bling Bonus: After Sample & Remix kills a champion and copies an item, create @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_QiyanaComponentCount@ permanent component(s).

[Radiant items, Artifacts, and Emblems cannot be copied]

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Sample & Remix

ability.desc:
For the next @Duration@ seconds, gain a @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) Shield and attacks deal @ModifiedSplashDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage to her target and enemies within 1 hex of the target.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Voxel Defense

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks that critically strike grant a stack of Style, up to @MaxStacks@ stacks. Each stack grants @ModifiedAS@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed.

Active: Deal @BaseADDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target, then another @ADDamagePerStack@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage per Style stack. Afterwards, reset Style.

@TFTUnitProperty.unit:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Thrills & Kills

ability.desc:
Fire a blast of sound at the current target's location. It pulses @PULSE_COUNT@ times, each dealing @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within @RANGE@ hex.

Bling Bonus: -@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_SennaMana@@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_SennaMana@ max Mana

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Concussive Noise

ability.desc:
Send a high note to the largest clump of units that hits all units within 1 hex. Enemies take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Allies heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: High Note

ability.desc:
Gain a @ShieldMin@ Shield for @Duration@ seconds, increased by @ShieldIncreasePerHealthThreshold@ for every @MissingHealthThreshold@ missing Health. Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and @TotalSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a cone around them.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: THE PUNCHLINE

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks instead send a beat to an ally, healing them for @HealRatio*100@% of their maximum Health.

Active: Send a beat to all allies and grant them a @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @Duration@ seconds.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: The Drop (Kinetic)

ability.desc:
Gain a @SHIELD_TOTAL@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield for @DURATION@ seconds. Taric's next @EMPOWERED_ATTACKS@ attacks deal @BONUS_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Mirrorball's Blessing

ability.desc:
Stun the largest group of nearby enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to each. Thresh heals for @FlatHeal@ + @HealingScale*100@% of the total damage dealt.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Devil's Round Up

ability.desc:
Throw a bottle at the current target, which deals @ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex. It explodes into @SecondaryExplosions@ shards; each dealing @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to a random enemy within 2 hexes. Each enemy critically struck by the bottle creates @BonusExplosionsOnCrit@ more shard.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Bottled Anarchy

ability.desc:
For @Duration@ seconds, convert bonus Attack Speed to Attack Damage. Attacks deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage in a cone and grant Urgot @ShieldRatio*100@% of the damage dealt as a @ShieldDuration@ second Shield.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Fire from his Fingertips

ability.desc:
Send a shadow to the current target that Stuns enemies within 1 hex for @StunDuration@ seconds. Then, it deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 1 hex.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Your Funeral

ability.desc:
Deal @PUNCH_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target, or @EMPOWERED_PUNCH_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) if they have more current Health than Vi. Stun them for @STUN_DURATION@ seconds and reduce their Armor by @ModifiedArmorReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%) for the rest of combat.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: The Harder They Fall

ability.desc:
Slam on a nearby hex. Deal @ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within two hexes and mark them for @ModifiedMarkDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds. Marked enemies take @MarkBonusDamage*100@% increased damage from all sources.

Viego's attacks on marked enemies deal @ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage instead.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Riff of the Ruined King

ability.desc:
Passive: Yasuo permanently gains @AD_KILL_GAIN@% Attack Damage when he kills an enemy champion (doubled in Hyper Roll). (Current: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_YasuoADGain@% %i:scaleAD%)

Active: Deal @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) to the current target.

Bling Bonus: Synthesizer Strike executes enemies under @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_YasuoExecute@%@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_YasuoExecute@% Health

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Synthesizer Strike

ability.desc:
Gain stacking Move Speed and @StackingOmnivamp@% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp for the rest of combat. Slash twice, dealing @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a cone each time.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Pop Off

ability.desc:
Summon @ZOMBIE_COUNT@ headbanging ghouls that pile towards the center of the board. Each deals @TOTAL_DAMAGE@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage over three attacks. Ghouls' damage @ArmorShredPercent*100@% Sunders for @ArmorShredDuration@ seconds.

Every other cast also summons a BIG ghoul with @BigZombieModifiedHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health that deals @BigZombieModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage each attack.

Sunder: Reduce Armor by 20%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: GET IN THIS PIT! (ft. Ghouls)

ability.desc:
Bounce @BounceCount@ times on nearby enemies. Each bounce deals @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, Stuns for @stunduration@ second, and heals Zac for @ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Let's Bounce!

ability.desc:
Mark the current target and spawn an untargetable Shadow with @FinalAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) Attack Damage for @Duration@ seconds. After a brief delay or when the marked enemy falls below @ModifiedHealthThreshold@% (%i:scaleAP%) health, deal an additional @TotalMarkDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_Headliner_TRA@
ability.name: Shadow Dance

ability.desc:
Throw a bomb at the current target that deals @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. It splits into @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT10_ZiggsSmallBombs@ smaller bombs that Shred their target for @ShredDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedBombDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Each cast increases the number of smaller bombs by @NumToIncreasePerCast@.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist by 30%
